00021 #ifndef AHRS_FLOAT_DCM_H
00022 #define AHRS_FLOAT_DCM_H
00023 
00024 #include <inttypes.h>
00025 #include "math/pprz_algebra_float.h"
00026 
00027 struct AhrsFloatDCM {
00028   struct FloatRates gyro_bias;
00029   struct FloatRates rate_correction;
00030   /*
00031     Holds float version of IMU alignement
00032     in order to be able to run against the fixed point
00033     version of the IMU
00034   */
00035   struct FloatQuat body_to_imu_quat;
00036   struct FloatRMat body_to_imu_rmat;
00037 };
00038 extern struct AhrsFloatDCM ahrs_impl;

00041 extern float ins_pitch_neutral;

00043 void ahrs_update_fw_estimator(void);

00048 #define Kp_ROLLPITCH 0.015
00049 #define Ki_ROLLPITCH 0.000010
00050 #define Kp_YAW 0.9          //High yaw drift correction gain - use with caution!
00051 #define Ki_YAW 0.00005

00060 // Mode 1 = DCM integration with Kp and Ki
00061 // Mode 2 = direct accelerometer -> euler
